title: LMD_RNAseq pipeline - Sample.txt schema
description: Schema for the sample metadata file used by the LMD_RNAseq pipeline

SID.errorMessage: Sample ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces
SID.description: Sample ID (unique identifier for each LMD sample)

SHORT_NAME.errorMessage: Short name must be provided and cannot contain spaces
SHORT_NAME.description: Short sample name used for output file naming

REPLICATE.errorMessage: Replicate identifier must be provided and cannot contain spaces

RID.errorMessage: Run ID must be provided and cannot contain spaces

strandedness.errorMessage: Strandedness must be one of: forward, reverse, unstranded

FASTQ_FOLDER.errorMessage: FASTQ folder path must be provided, cannot contain spaces, and must be a valid directory path
FASTQ_FOLDER.description: Full path to directory containing FASTQ files for this sample
